Text.Name: BuildCurb1
Text.Desc: While constructing a wonder, some people started causing a fuss about the Feng Shui here.

Text.Name: BuildCurb2
Text.Desc: While constructing a wonder, some people came over to ask what's going on.

Text.Name: BuildCurb3
Text.Desc: While constructing a wonder, some people wanted to give us a reward.
